Class InstructorPasswordPromptController

java.lang.Object
com.arcane.arithmetic.InstructorPasswordPromptController
public class InstructorPasswordPromptController extends Object
This is the Instructor Password Prompt Controller, used for controls and events in the instructor password prompt
Author:
Justin Xu
